page.title: 19EMMA
page.content: Every morning my Nan wakes Emma with her early morning cup of tea. She helps her out of bed. Emma has trouble getting to the toilet,sometimes she has accidents. Emma is a slow walker and needs a frame. She sits in her sitting room for her breakfast. She is 83 and rather plump. When I go and see Emma she likes to talk about the olden days. My Nan is a qualified nurse and prefers to look after old people. My Nan helps her to get dressed and then Emma sits in her armchair and reads the paper until lunch. She has her lunch at one o'clock. Emma watches television in the afternoon and has a sleep for one hour. Emma lives with my Nan because she is kind. Her own family aren't able to look after her.
